name: Spirit Serpent's Swirl
title: Floral Ring-Dancer: Spirit Serpent's Swirl
desc: "...Even though all such gods and kings have now faded into the flowing sands, the memory of dance yet persists in the desert-dwellers' veins."
in_play_description: When your Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer, who has this card equipped, is on the field, when you switch your active character to one with Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent equipped: Deal 1 Dendro DMG. (Once each Round)

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer, equip this card. After Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer equips this card, immediately use Spiraling Whirl once. When your Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer, who has this card equipped, is on the field, when you switch your active character to one with Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent equipped: Deal 1 Dendro DMG. (Once each Round) (You must have Eremite Floral Ring-Dancer in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
